Skill Notes:

Mastermind: Skill Trained (Society; Choose 1 from Arcana, Nature, Occultism, Religion)
Rogue Skills: Skill Trained (Stealth; Choose 8 from any)
Skill Increases: Skill Increase (Choose 2 from any)
Acrobatic Performer: Can use Acrobatics to Perform
Aerobatics Mastery: +2 Acrobatics to Maneuver In Flight and can attempt to combine 2 maneuvers at the higher DC + 5
Mastermind: Successful Recall Knowledge to identify a creature inflicts off-guard vs. self attacks until the start of the next turn, or for 1 min on a critical success
Quick Squeeze: Can Squeeze 5' per rd, or 10' per rd on a critical success
Steady Balance: Balance successes are critical successes/Balance does not inflict off-balance/Can use Acrobatics to Grab An Edge
Streetwise: Can use Society to Gather Information and to Recall Knowledge in familiar settlements
Combat
Hit Points: 38 Armor Class: 16 (dexterity (5 max); trained) Class DC: Rogue: 16 (dexterity; trained)
Armor: Explorer's Clothing Shield: Tower (+2 AC when raised; hardness 5; HP 20) Weapons: Fist (+7 1d4+2 B; strength; trained); Main-gauche (+7 1d4+2 P/S; strength; trained); Sap (+7 1d6+2 B; strength; trained)
Combat Notes:
Constitution Hit Points Adjustment: +6
Dexterity Armor Class Adjustment: +1
Dexterity Attack Adjustment: +1
Strength Attack Adjustment: +2
Unconventional Weaponry (Shortbow): Weapon Familiarity (Shortbow)
Clever Gambit: (R) Follows a critical hit on an identified creature with a Step or Stride that does not provoke target reactions
Deny Advantage: Does not suffer off-guard vs. hidden, undetected, flanking, or surprising foes of up to level 3
Kip Up: (F) Stands up without triggering reactions
Sneak Attack: Successful strike using an agile, finesse, or projectile weapon vs. a off-guard foe inflicts +1d6 HP precision damage
Surprise Attack: Rolling Deception or Stealth for initiative inflicts off-guard vs. self on creatures that haven't acted
Tumble Behind: Successful Tumble Through inflicts off-guard against the next self attack until the end of the turn
Tumbling Teamwork: Successful Tumble Through a foe's space allows adjacent allies to Step as a reaction into another adjacent space
Save: Fortitude: +7 (constitution; trained); Reflex: +8 (dexterity; expert); Will: +10 (wisdom; expert)
Save Notes: Cat Fall: Suffers 50' less damage from falling
